        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

        <div class="grid-x bg-white grid-padding-x grid-padding-y" style="width: 100%; position: relative;" itemtype="http://schema.org/Product" itemscope><div class="cell small-12" id="toptop"><h1 <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_1" v-pre>
</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="68960" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="68960" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">3.78</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="322">322</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="52"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Spell On You</b> by <b>Louis Vuitton</b> is a Floral fragrance for women. <b>Spell On You</b> was launched in 2021. The nose behind this fragrance is Jacques Cavallier Belletrud. Top notes are Violet, Tuscan Iris and Green Notes; middle notes are Rose, Tuscan Iris and Chinese Jasmine; base notes are Peach, Acácia and White Musk. </p><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a href="https://www.fragrantica.de/Parfum/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Deutsch</a>,  <a <div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_5" v-pre>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12"><ul class="tabs" data-deep-link="true" data-update-history="true" data-deep-link-smudge="true" data-deep-link-smudge-delay="500" data-tabs id="deeplinked-tabs"><li class="tabs-title is-active"><a href="#all-reviews" aria-selected="true"><svg class="menu" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 20 20" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M10 18a8 8 0 100-16 8 8 0 000 16zm1-12a1 1 0 10-2 0v4a1 1 0 00.293.707l2.828 2.829a1 1 0 101.415-1.415L11 9.586V6z"clip-rule="evenodd"></path></svg>All reviews by date</a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-positive-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><like style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;"></like><span class="show-for-medium">Positive Reviews</span></a></li><li class="tabs-title"><a href="#popular-negative-reviews"><svg class="menu hide-for-medium" style="width: 1rem; height: 1rem;display: inline-block" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M7 8h10M7 12h4m1 8l-4-4H5a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h14a2 2 0 012 2v8a2 2 0 01-2 2h-3l-4 4z"></path></svg><dislike style="width: 1rem;         <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2347635" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2347635" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Vodka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/84109"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Vodka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Les-Parfums-de-Rosine/La-Rose-de-Rosine-6503.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.6503.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="La Rose de Rosine"title="La Rose de Rosine"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2347635ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2347635" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/84109">Vodka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-13">11/13/24 09:46</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Tested on a vial. This is very similar to YSL's Paris latest formulation. Very floral, slightly powdery but overall mature. If you have Paris, you don't need Spell On You.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2347635"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2347635#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1468170">Catmo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 16:44</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Super powdery and old fashioned, very mature.<br />
Giving my grandma getting dressed in a hairspray filled bathroom in 1998.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2314803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2314803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314651" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kishka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/254635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.254635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kishka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Ombre-Nomade-49755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombre Nomade"title="Ombre Nomade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/254635">kishka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 14:01</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My second review of this beauty. I’ve just had mine refilled at Louis Vuitton and I really love it. Fresh opening which is ultra feminine and makes me feel soft and elegant……the middle is rose and Iris which is a bit challenging because it’s real Iris palladia that’s used, not much probably but enough. Then the dry down is soft rose and peach. I’ve worn Ombré Nomade which is turbo charged amber with a punch which I also love but it’s a tough perfume to wear everyday. For me these two from LV have taken over from Chanel les Exclusifs because of the quality.  I gave up on Chanel after trying the new reformulated EDP’s. Perfume love is a fickle mistress these days when NOTHING stays the same, gone are the classics that were always what they promised to be.  Too much on the market, too many new releases so I go from house to house like a whore…….</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2314651"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2314651#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2308847" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2308847" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="CChanel"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206247"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1206247.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="CChanel" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2308847ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2308847" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1206247">CChanel</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-08">10/08/24 08:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>In essence it reminds me Grojsmans's YSL Paris.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2308847"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2308847#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2274803" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2274803" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lessthanzero"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1512520"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1512520.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lessthanzero" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Narciso-Rodriguez/Narciso-Rodriguez-For-Him-Eau-de-Parfum-Intense-14741.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.14741.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Narciso Rodriguez For Him Eau de Parfum Intense"title="Narciso Rodriguez For Him Eau de Parfum Intense"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2274803ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2274803" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1512520">lessthanzero</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-07">09/07/24 10:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A strange perfume. Sort of like a fresh floral freesia with an aquatic touch from the 90's... but with "new and improved" aromachemicals. Very green and violet forward on my skin, smelling almost like mosquito repellant. Simultaneously, it is a very demure, old-fashioned, innocent rose and iris perfume... I don't get much of the jasmine and it's not sweet at all. I am only 2 hours in to the wear now, and haven't yet gotten any of the peach, though the white musky base is clearly legible.<br />
<br />
Maybe you can tell that it's not my favorite. I haven't liked anything from this Louis Vuitton collection so far. I feel they all have a plasticky, mass-market smell, many with an aquatic note shoe-horned in. But I have to admit... I can't stop sniffing this one!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2274803"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2274803#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6" v-pre>
</div></div><div id="parent2254341" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2254341" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Solpolmol"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215988"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Solpolmol" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2254341ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2254341" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2215988">Solpolmol</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-19">08/19/24 12:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Scent: 5/10<br />
The opening and middle of this fragrance were very beautiful and deep powdery and floral notes that would be very good for daytime and everyday use. However, and I'm not sure if this just on my skin but, the dry down has a strange dirty note that just doesn't go well.<br />
<br />
Longevity: 7/10<br />
Just a pretty decent longevity of around 5-6 hours.<br />
<br />
Projection: 4/10<br />
Decent projection in the first hour, but becomes very weak and a skin scent.<br />
<br />
Is it worth the price (320USD): 2/10<br />
Absolutely not. It's very boring for what it is. The only way I would recommend you this is if you were a billionaire looking for an everyday scent. Other than that, it's just way too boring for the price.<br />
<br />
Final Rating: 5.0 / 10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2254341"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2254341#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2250866" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2250866" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Jaydon377"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796079"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796079.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Jaydon377" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2250866ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2250866" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796079">Jaydon377</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-08-15">08/15/24 23:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Fantastic rose iris scent. This is one of the few LV fragrances that warranted a full bottle for me. This is easily one of the most unique from the lineup. The opening is this gorgeous blend of Iris, Violet and green notes which come together to create a unique take on a makeup or lipstick type of smell. The rose is bright and watery to add to the green nuance. The peach is not overpowering at all it is more like a peach skin rather than the fruit. The notes are blended beautifully nothing really sticks out too much. This has great sillage as well. I do get lots of compliments wearing this. This is an overall very elegant fragrance and a stand out from the brand. I do also own a bottle of Dancing Blossom and Feminin Pluriel by MFK which this is compared to. This is completely different and unique from those scents.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2250866"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2250866#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205460" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's way too strong and sweet for me. Florals should be toned down, not loud in my opinion. The dry down is lovely, though. But I mainly buy a perfume to love from opening to dry down.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2204046"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2204046#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2194271" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.74);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Very nostalgic, but smelly cheapy, not worth the price. ridiculous.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1970550"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1970550#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1952947" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; If you are a fan of white floral then this fragrance is definitely for you and if you are looking for a reasonable bottle then this brand is totally for you!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It's the safest and comfiest choice for every woman and every girl should own this one. It's fresh, floral, attractive and can give you so many compliments the entire day. The only minor issue is this that it gets watery after spraying and gives me OCD. If this issue can be resolved, or if someone can recommend me a perfect dupe for this one, because I am in awe of this fragrance and cannot let it go at all!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910970" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kishka"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/254635"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.254635.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kishka" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Ombre-Nomade-49755.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.49755.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ombre Nomade"title="Ombre Nomade"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910970ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910970" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/254635">kishka</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-25">08/25/23 03:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is stunning and totally blew me away when I smelt it in the Louis Vuitton store recently. It opens with a vintage vibe of powdery iris, violet and later a sharp rose. Later I can pick up a soft apricot/peach fragrance which intermingles with the powdery violet and projects for a good few hours. I love it. I want it and would love a bottle. Sillage is good for this type of perfume and longevity is fair. I just think it delivers that feminine vintage quality within a modern perfume. Plus with LV the quality of the ingredients shine like a light over and above the dross of other houses.<br />
Edit. I bought a bottle. 100ml. It’s really beautiful!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1910970"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1910970#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1903662" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311785">Clauder13</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-05-22">05/22/23 15:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so good!<br />
Super smooth, clean and fresh! <br />
Fruity, floral and powdery, works everywhere and anytime, so it would a perfect signature scent for women.<br />
It would put a spell on me, grab my attention and most definitely attract me if I smelled this on a woman walking by.<br />
A really safe blind buy, can't go wrong with this stuff.<br />
Amazing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1839497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1839497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1824739" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1740862" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tgirl1991"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1659828.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tgirl1991" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Penhaligon-s/The-Favourite-59836.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.59836.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="The Favourite"title="The Favourite"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1740862ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1740862" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1659828">tgirl1991</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-01-22">01/22/23 17:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Pretty disappointed with this. I got a sample of this with an LV purchase and it smells slightly better in the bottle than it does on my skin. Either way, to me, regardless of how it smells, considering it basically faded within 4 hours to the point I could barely smell it, this is just simply NOT worth the price point. Separately, when you FIRST spray it, it's quite strong...honestly, one of the strongest floral smells I've ever worn and I was concerned I would get a headache from it, which really doesn't happen to me usually. There are also some powdery notes, but I found the floral smell to be quite overpowering. Honestly, this scent is just really nothing special and there are so many other floral fragrances out there that are much better value - meaning you'll get a nicer smell, for longer, and it'll be cheaper.<br />
<br />
Scent Description: Very floral, Hints of Powder<br />
Sillage: Arms Length<br />
Longevity: Starts very strong, fades quickly. At most 4 hours.<br />
Presentation: Basic Pink bottle with a black cap.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1740862"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1740862#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1708253" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/19867">aqua76239</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-12-13">12/13/22 05:50</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was given a sample of this with my LV order. Right away this reminded me of something and it took few times sniffing it for me to put a finger on it. Bond #9 Gold Coast. It has the same fresh rose clean vibe although Gold Coast is fresher and cleaner and Spell on You is more garden variety floral. Not my fave but only because i don't care for those type of scents. If you like clean rose musk, look no further although i think you can probably find something similar for less money</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1708253"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1708253#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1666234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1666234" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="nikath"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235347"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="nikath" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Amouage/Love-Delight-89959.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89959.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Love Delight"title="Love Delight"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1666234ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1666234" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235347">nikath</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-10-14">10/14/22 16:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Delicate, musky, powdery iris/rose scent. I find Spell On You to be beautiful, I adore the LV musk and would love to have them all if price was not an issue. This fragrance is very light and sophisticated, it is not sweet and not particularly floral, but smells like a powdery luxurious lipstick. Great for daytime, office safe, formal events etc. With that said, longevity is about three hours on my skin and the silliage is intimate. Safe to say the performance is disappointing for this price range.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1666234"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1666234#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1600617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1600617" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="The Wolf"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1263755.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="The Wolf" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Perris-Monte-Carlo/Oud-Imperial-Extrait-37829.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.37829.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Oud Imperial Extrait"title="Oud Imperial Extrait"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1600617ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1600617" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1263755">The Wolf</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-07-10">07/10/22 23:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Got a sample for my GF when I bought a different scent. <br />
Rose and peach is mainly what I get. <br />
Makes you want to take a deep breath.<br />
<br />
I don't get a ton of iris which surprises me when I look at the notes it's listed twice but.... I don't trust fragrantica's note tree. Kinda get an ozone hairspray vibe but it's not overpowering. Reminds me of womens hair fragrances and shampoo 🧴<br />
<br />
Pretty nice but not worth niche prices IMO. <br />
<br />
Scent 6/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1600617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1600617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1588644" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1588644" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LadyBratface"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523099"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1523099.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LadyBratface" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Roja-Dove/Sultanate-Of-Oman-45746.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.45746.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sultanate Of Oman"title="Sultanate Of Oman"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1588644ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1588644" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1523099">LadyBratface</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-21">06/21/22 09:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not a favorite for me.  The green/iris note is right there on the cusp of being that head-ache threat.  This would be an 'ok to dislike' rating for me. It started out as 'dislike' but as it's worn/warmed/faded, I am enjoying it more. I appreciate that it's soft and light and after about an hour of wear has faded into the background and is less 'in your face' harshness.  I can see people enjoying this on a warm day as it's not very cloying/heavy. I've seen some reviews stating that people would like this to be stronger and longer lasting but I just don't feel that this is that type of fragrance.  Perhaps because I am wary of the white floral/iris notes, I appreciate a fragrance that can take more of a back seat.   Not a fragrance I would wear on-the-regular.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1588644"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1588644#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saraheve97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1489993.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saraheve97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993">Saraheve97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-05">06/05/22 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am very much a fragrance amateur, but I want to try to do this scent justice. This is not something that I would have thought to reach for normally. I'm not typically a fan of powdery scents and violet and iris have previously been no-go notes for me. However, I have recently been looking for a soft, feminine, everyday scent (signature if you will). I found what I was looking for in this perfume.<br />
<br />
I will start off by saying this is in no way groundbreaking, but I have come to love it. It starts off very powdery with a violet note right off the top. I can also smell some greenness, but it's not overpowering or offensive. I love the drydown of this. I would say the most prominent note of this scent is the iris, but the jasmine and rose are also detectable (slightly), and I think they serve to "tone down" the powdery iris in a cool way. I can very faintly detect the peach note, and I think that does a good job of combating the powdery aspect too to make it more smooth. <br />
<br />
The vibes: I can for sure get a bit of a makeup-y or lipstick-y vibe from this scent. Overall, it just makes me feel ultra feminine, clean, and sophisticated. It definitely feels more mature, but I am 24 and in love with it. I couldn't see younger girls really wanting to smell like this.<br />
<br />
Lastly, I would say that this has intimate/moderate sillage and moderate longevity. After I spray this I go nose-blind to it for about 30 minutes, but after it warms up on my skin, then I can smell it for at least 6-8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1578097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1578097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1569160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1569160" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vintaqe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1493111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vintaqe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Missing-Person-72665.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72665.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Missing Person"title="Missing Person"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1569160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1569160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493111">vintaqe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-22">05/22/22 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like hairspray. I felt a bit rushed at the LV counter and besides Les Sables Roses, I was unsure what to get. I purchased Attrape-Reves and immediately returned it and exchanged it for this. (The patchouli dry down is HEAVY! I sprayed a sample card a week and some change ago and it still smells like it) It’s a pretty scent, but it really does smell like a hairspray that I wore as a kid. The sillage is laughable. I’m unsure of the longevity yet, but I think I may be partially noseblind to this. For some reasons all of the LV perfumes have this weird sweat smell opening to them - like a hot summers day. Maybe aquatic in a sense? Just sweaty .. lol. It’s nice and I’m glad to have it. Is it worth $300? Absolutely not.<br />
<br />
*edited to add* I wore this perfume today and have received so many compliments from strangers. Literally being stopped to ask what I’m wearing. I’ve been wearing it for about 3 hours and I can still smell it on myself (I sprayed a generous amount because it is a weaker scent) It wears very well and smells the same throughout the opening, middle and base.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1569160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1569160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1555181" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1555181" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="icingsugar"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58479"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.58479.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="icingsugar" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/L-Artisan-Parfumeur/Passage-d-Enfer-4572.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.4572.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Passage d'Enfer"title="Passage d'Enfer"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1555181ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1555181" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/58479">icingsugar</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-02">05/02/22 05:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Absolutely stunning spring time scent. The sweet, slightly powdery violet really stands out initially, followed by a soapy rose undertone. It's light and floral and really beautiful, and I would love a full bottle if it weren't for the price tag. I imagine you could find something similar for less as it isn't particularly original, just composed very well.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1555181"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1555181#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1554756" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1529206" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="spiceysauce5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019346"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="spiceysauce5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1529206ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1529206" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1019346">spiceysauce5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-23">03/23/22 19:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Did not smell special. I almost got a plummy vibe from it but it’s watery and flat.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1529206"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1529206#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1525881" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1525881" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wednesdaychild41"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1191239.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wednesdaychild41" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Papillon-Artisan-Perfumes/Epona-95954.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95954.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Epona"title="Epona"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1525881ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1525881" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1191239">Wednesdaychild41</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-18">03/18/22 14:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I personally found this very iris heavy. And i definitely couldn't detect Rose unless searching for it. Sampled Spell on you today, and I'm relatively underwhelmed. <br />
It's roughly a 'raw cold potato' style iris in the opening, which remains soft and light. Pretty pastel colours move in which give it a bit of movement. But it could easily be compared to a room air freshner or many other scents.<br />
I pick up on a musk which is kind of typical. <br />
Honestly, this is not a £215 fragrance. It's so boring.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1525881"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1525881#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1524769" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; On paper it is feminine, clean, and non-obtrussive but turned really sour and powdery on my skin.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1524769"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1524769#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1522505" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1522505" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="applejack78"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1281241"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1281241.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="applejack78" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1522505ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1522505" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1281241">applejack78</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-03-13">03/13/22 11:58</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Spell on You is aptly named. I've been beguiled by this fragrance and want a full bottle! It's a feminine rose with just the right amount of sweetness. Not too light, and not too heavy. I suspect this will definitely be a compliment magnet. If you enjoy rose fragrances, please add this to your try list.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1522505"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1522505#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1504973" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; A kind of perfume you would chose for your 14 years old daughter in the late 90’s.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1504973"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1504973#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1479019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is quite fragrant and I imagine a greenhouse filled with fragrant roses, its powdery and in the air, like a cloud of rose that envelopes the wearer.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; -There are some sour fruity notes in the background, but I can't pick out any specific fruit. (-)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1453054"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1453054#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1447583" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1447583" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="RavenValkyrie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363579"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="RavenValkyrie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1447583ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1447583" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1363579">RavenValkyrie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-11-17">11/17/21 13:21</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wanted to like this, but it is just so far from what I expected/hoped for when first hearing the name of the EDP as it was launched. <br />
There certainly seems to be a dichotomy between the title and the actual fragrance.<br />
The scent in itself might serve as a fine reflection of the non-complex, somewhat generic, girly-girl scents trending on the market right now, but there is little to be captivated/spellbound by if you prefer the truly hypnotic, more risqué or alluring scents out there. <br />
Granted, this is not a niche or statement Edp- rather it smells inoffensive and sweet, almost demure, so you will not risk being the center of antagonistic outbursts, i.e. public shaming, for wearing this scent. <br />
You could easily wear this at the office or as a clerk wanting to smell well-groomed, but nothing too noticeable.<br />
<br />
However, there is just no spell on me after wearing this. None whatsoever.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1447583"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1447583#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1425131" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1425131" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="tonkatsu335"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1254643.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="tonkatsu335" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Linda-Landenberg/A-Trembling-Rose-47015.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.47015.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="A Trembling Rose"title="A Trembling Rose"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1425131ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1425131" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1254643">tonkatsu335</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-10-09">10/09/21 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I just tried it on a blotter and it has a weird plastic-like smell. I would venture to say it smells like apples and roses, but it's not at all what I was expecting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1425131"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1425131#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1410284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1410284" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Essarai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236293"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1236293.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Essarai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.68960.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Spell On You"title="Spell On You"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1410284ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1410284" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236293">Essarai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-14">09/14/21 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my bottle of Spell On You. The opening is similar to Hueres d’Absense with the bright lychee which then leads into the iris. This dry down is really giving me Rolling in Love from By Kilian just not as synthetic.  RIL was always a little too synthetic for me but there was something about that iris note that I loved and Jacques Cavallier seems to have picked up on that and refined it.  I don’t get rose from this at all which the Fragrantica notes would lead you to believe. I do like how different this seems from the rest of the LV women's perfume collection as it really has it's own voice.  There's about a millisecond where it reminds you of Rose Des Vents but after that it really transforms.  This is a sexy perfume but probably not a blind buy.  If you like Heures d'absence and Rose Des Vents, you'll like this :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1410284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1410284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1405953" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1405953" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="La Place Rouge"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235343"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1235343.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="La Place Rouge" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1405953ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1405953" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1235343">La Place Rouge</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-07">09/07/21 08:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A glamorous and perfect rendition of the classical theme of cherry blossom, hence the colour of the juice. Though the scent is fine and sparkling, I would not recommend it to a young lady. It is rather beautiful than stylish unlike their Etoile Filante. But should you happen to be a fun of Dior's Sakura, you will adore this summery nonchalant chef d'oeuvre :-) Enjoy!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1405953"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1405953#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1403335" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1403335" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kiettuan77"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383408"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kiettuan77" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1403335ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1403335" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1383408">kiettuan77</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-02">09/02/21 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sampled this one today since I have been collecting LV perfume. The opening is very pleasant with sweet, slightly powdery, rose. The more into the dry down, the more it soapy it gets, quite a generic scent in my opinion. Last pretty long on my skin, around 6 hrs. Quite disappointed tbh.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1403335"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1403335#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                    </div>
