</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-positive-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Positive Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
                            <div id="parent1569160" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1569160" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vintaqe"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1493111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vintaqe" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Phlur/Missing-Person-72665.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72665.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Missing Person"title="Missing Person"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1569160ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1569160" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1493111">vintaqe</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-05-22">05/22/22 13:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells like hairspray. I felt a bit rushed at the LV counter and besides Les Sables Roses, I was unsure what to get. I purchased Attrape-Reves and immediately returned it and exchanged it for this. (The patchouli dry down is HEAVY! I sprayed a sample card a week and some change ago and it still smells like it) It’s a pretty scent, but it really does smell like a hairspray that I wore as a kid. The sillage is laughable. I’m unsure of the longevity yet, but I think I may be partially noseblind to this. For some reasons all of the LV perfumes have this weird sweat smell opening to them - like a hot summers day. Maybe aquatic in a sense? Just sweaty .. lol. It’s nice and I’m glad to have it. Is it worth $300? Absolutely not.<br />
<br />
*edited to add* I wore this perfume today and have received so many compliments from strangers. Literally being stopped to ask what I’m wearing. I’ve been wearing it for about 3 hours and I can still smell it on myself (I sprayed a generous amount because it is a weaker scent) It wears very well and smells the same throughout the opening, middle and base.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1569160"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1569160#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1839497" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Super smooth, clean and fresh! <br />
Fruity, floral and powdery, works everywhere and anytime, so it would a perfect signature scent for women.<br />
It would put a spell on me, grab my attention and most definitely attract me if I smelled this on a woman walking by.<br />
A really safe blind buy, can't go wrong with this stuff.<br />
Amazing!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1839497"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1839497#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1410284" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1236293">Essarai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2021-09-14">09/14/21 10:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just received my bottle of Spell On You. The opening is similar to Hueres d’Absense with the bright lychee which then leads into the iris. This dry down is really giving me Rolling in Love from By Kilian just not as synthetic.  RIL was always a little too synthetic for me but there was something about that iris note that I loved and Jacques Cavallier seems to have picked up on that and refined it.  I don’t get rose from this at all which the Fragrantica notes would lead you to believe. I do like how different this seems from the rest of the LV women's perfume collection as it really has it's own voice.  There's about a millisecond where it reminds you of Rose Des Vents but after that it really transforms.  This is a sexy perfume but probably not a blind buy.  If you like Heures d'absence and Rose Des Vents, you'll like this :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1410284"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1410284#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2205353" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2205353" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Itcannotalwaysbenight"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1416320.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Itcannotalwaysbenight" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Celine/Zouzou-92290.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.92290.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Zouzou"title="Zouzou"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2205353ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2205353" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.86); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1416320">Itcannotalwaysbenight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-07-01">07/01/24 22:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Major compliment getter. Don’t judge this until it warms up on your skin. Sweet florals mixed with buttery, not too powdery iris. Just stunning!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="2205353"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=2205353#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1578097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1578097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Saraheve97"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1489993.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Saraheve97" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1578097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1578097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1489993">Saraheve97</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-06-05">06/05/22 01:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I am very much a fragrance amateur, but I want to try to do this scent justice. This is not something that I would have thought to reach for normally. I'm not typically a fan of powdery scents and violet and iris have previously been no-go notes for me. However, I have recently been looking for a soft, feminine, everyday scent (signature if you will). I found what I was looking for in this perfume.<br />
<br />
I will start off by saying this is in no way groundbreaking, but I have come to love it. It starts off very powdery with a violet note right off the top. I can also smell some greenness, but it's not overpowering or offensive. I love the drydown of this. I would say the most prominent note of this scent is the iris, but the jasmine and rose are also detectable (slightly), and I think they serve to "tone down" the powdery iris in a cool way. I can very faintly detect the peach note, and I think that does a good job of combating the powdery aspect too to make it more smooth. <br />
<br />
The vibes: I can for sure get a bit of a makeup-y or lipstick-y vibe from this scent. Overall, it just makes me feel ultra feminine, clean, and sophisticated. It definitely feels more mature, but I am 24 and in love with it. I couldn't see younger girls really wanting to smell like this.<br />
<br />
Lastly, I would say that this has intimate/moderate sillage and moderate longevity. After I spray this I go nose-blind to it for about 30 minutes, but after it warms up on my skin, then I can smell it for at least 6-8 hours.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1578097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1578097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68960" sentiment="positive"></reviews-infinity>
            </div>
</div>
</div><div class="tabs-panel" id="popular-negative-reviews"><div class="cell">
    <div class="strike-title"><span>Most Popular Negative Reviews</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1972759" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="violeteme"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1387189"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1387189.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="violeteme" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sisley/Sisley-Eau-de-3-5852.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.5852.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sisley Eau de 3"title="Sisley Eau de 3"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1972759ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1972759" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.72); I don't understand the comparison with Femininity Pluriel. Just no. Very basic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1972759"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1972759#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1479019" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1479019" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Dramaloladiva"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309211"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1309211.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Dramaloladiva" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Gris-Montaigne-17842.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.17842.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Gris Montaigne"title="Gris Montaigne"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1479019ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1479019" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1309211">Dramaloladiva</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2022-01-08">01/08/22 12:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I find this one from Louis Vuitton to be lacking...<br />
It’s rose-y, to be sure, and very “green” but it seems unfinished, rushed and linear.<br />
The scent itself doesn’t match its name at all as I am certainly not under its spell...Rather, I am left dissatisfied and disappointed 😞 <br />
Oh well, I only got a small decant...glad I didn’t blind buy this.<br />
My humble suggestion is to sample it first...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="68960"comment_id="1479019"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Louis-Vuitton/Spell-On-You-68960.html?ccid=1479019#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div>                            <reviews-infinity :random-colors="[&quot;#fefcee&quot;,&quot;#faf7ec&quot;,&quot;#f9f9f3&quot;,&quot;#f8f9ec&quot;,&quot;#fffdea&quot;,&quot;#faf9fb&quot;,&quot;#faf5f2&quot;,&quot;#f7f4f2&quot;]" :perfume-id="68960" sentiment="negative"></reviews-infinity>

              tabindex="1" title="There is a small church situated near the Moskva river, Храм Живоначальной Троицы в Хо рошеве. The first time I went there it smelled exactly like a perfume I would discover only 10 years later: James Heeley Cardinal. I find west european churches to be more like Goutal Encens Flamboyant .">by
            <em>waldganger</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.1176737.jpg"
                                                     style="width: 2em; height: 2em; border-radius: 1em"></span>
    </div>
    <div class="latest-list flex-container">

        <a href="/news/Imaginary-Authors-Beach-Reads-20864.html#cc274243"><span class="link-span"></span>
                        <span class="ztworowseclipse">Imaginary Authors: Beach Reads</span>
        </a>
        <span class="avatar-tip" data-tooltip aria-haspopup="true" data-show-on="medium" data-disable-hover="false"
              tabindex="1" title="My absolute favorite of theirs has to be Imaginary Authors Slow Explosions it&#039;s so pleasing. And it smells fantastic on my skin. The longevity is quite poor however. After only two hours or so it becomes essentially a skin scent. ">by
            <em>FallenRouge</em> <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/s.2074463.jpg"

        <span style="display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 1; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis;">
            <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/designers/Roja-Dove.html" class="en2inter">Roja Dove</a>

    </div>

            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.punmiris.com").replace(/designers/, "dizajner").replace(/perfume/, "parfem") });
                if (lang == 'RO') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ro").replace(/designers/, "creatori").replace(/perfume/, "parfum") });
                if (lang == 'AR') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragranticarabia.com").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'UK') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.ua").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'MN') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.mn").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
                if (lang == 'HE') $("a.en2inter").attr("href", function () {
            return this.href.replace(/www.fragrantica.com/, "www.fragrantica.co.il").replace(/perfume/, "perfumes") });
            });
</script>


<script  data-cfasync="false">
    // Check that service workers are supported
    if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) {
        // Use the window load event to keep the page load performant
        window.addEventListener('load', () => {
            navigator.serviceWorker.register('/service-worker.js?v=rtgH0e5cbbe5e5f689826b719ace22a5b2a11');
        });
    }
</script>
<script>
    $(document).ready(function () {
        $('#fragranticaloader').fadeOut(20);
    });
</script>
</body>
</html>
